objects.query: Select Name, Phone, Type, Website, Site,Industry, Ownership, BillingStreet, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingPostalCode, BillingCountry, Handcrafted_for_eWRTS_Demo_Scenario__c, RecordTypeId from Account WHERE Handcrafted_for_eWRTS_Demo_Scenario__c = true AND RecordType.DeveloperName = 'eWRTS_Customer_Account'

SELECT FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone, MobilePhone, Title, Salutation, MailingStreet, MailingCity, MailingPostalCode, MailingState, MailingCountry, Fax, AccountId, Handcrafted_for_eWRTS_Demo_Scenario__c, RecordTypeId FROM Contact where Handcrafted_for_eWRTS_Demo_Scenario__c = true AND RecordType.DeveloperName = 'eWRTS_Custom_Contact'

SELECT Name, BarQR__Allow_Save_to_formats__c, BarQR__Barcode_Type__c, BarQR__Field_API_Name__c, BarQR__Font_Rendering__c, BarQR__Image_Rotation__c, BarQR__Object_API_Name__c, BarQR__Scale_X__c, BarQR__Scale_Y__c, BarQR__Show_Text_Also__c FROM BarQR__Barcode_Config__c

SELECT A_Number__c, AccountId, REQ_Alien_Status__c, REQ_All_Applications_and_Petitions__c, REQ_All_J_C_Forms__c, REQ_All_Removal_Documents__c, REQ_Application_Status__c, REQ_Biometric_Data__c, BusinessHoursId, Case_assigned_to_Contractor__c, Case_in_File_Retrieval__c, CaseNumber, Origin, OwnerId, Reason, RecordTypeId, SourceId, REQ_Charging_Documents__c, ContactEmail, ContactFax, ContactMobile , ContactId, ContactPhone, CreatedById, Date_Case_Assigned_to_Contractor__c, Date_Case_in_File_Retrieval__c, Date_File_Delivered__c, Date_File_Processed__c, Date_File_Pulled_for_Processing__c, Date_File_Pulled_from_Shelf__c, Date_Opened__c, ClosedDate, CreatedDate, Description, REQ_Entire_File__c, File_Delivered__c, File_Processed__c, File_Pulled_for_Processing__c, File_Pulled_from_Shelf__c, REQ_Fingerprints__c, Handcrafted_for_eWRTS_Demo_Scenario__c, REQ_I_130_Form__c, REQ_I_213_Form__c, REQ_I_485_Form__c, REQ_IJO_Form__c, Comments, LastModifiedById, Location_Site__c, REQ_N_400_600_Forms__c, REQ_Other_Documents__c, Other_Documents_Requested__c, REQ_Photos__c, Priority, Status, Subject, Type, User_Contact_Info_Validated__c from Case WHERE RecordType.Name = 'eWRTS Case'
SELECT Id, Type, Name from Group where Type = 'Queue'
